ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frlmsslss.y | |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) |

| 4 |  | frlmsslss.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | frlmsslss.c | |- C = { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( J X. { .0. } ) } |

| 7 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> I e. V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> J C_ I ) |

| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R freeLMod J ) = ( R freeLMod J ) |

| 13 | 12 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> ( ( x |` J ) = ( J X. { .0. } ) <-> ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rabbidv | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( J X. { .0. } ) } = { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } ) |

| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) = ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 10, 3, 16, 17 | #P_frlmsplit2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) e. ( Y LMHom ( R freeLMod J ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) e. _V |
| 20 | 17 | #P_mptiniseg | |- ( ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) e. _V -> ( `' ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) " { ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } ) = { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( `' ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) " { ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } ) = { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } |
| 22 | 21 | #P_eqcomi | |- { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } = ( `' ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) " { ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23, 2 | #P_lmhmkerlss | |- ( ( x e. B |-> ( x |` J ) ) e. ( Y LMHom ( R freeLMod J ) ) -> { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } e. U ) |
| 25 | 18, 24 | #P_syl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> { x e. B | ( x |` J ) = ( 0g ` ( R freeLMod J ) ) } e. U ) |
| 26 | 15, 25 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> C e. U ) |
